Title: Relates to providing student onboarding and ongoing education on reproductive health services
Summary: Requires student onboarding and ongoing education on reproductive health services available to students including where the closest reproductive health clinics are located; all resources available to a student seeking reproductive health services including but not limited to financial assistance and mental health services and any reproductive health resources available to a student through the institution.
LawCode: Add Art 129-C ยง6450, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing student onboarding and ongoing education on reproductive health services
